About Franitel

All this history start 22 year ago when I installed my first Linux distribution. (debian in Pentium 200 MMX). It was really hard but I don't known why, if it was by the penguin or it was for the idea to build something in a global community, that today its continue captivating me heart.

Currently I'm continue learning about Linux, CI/CD, kubernetes, hadoop, mesos,...

and to me it is as Matrix, you can be a Matrix user where you have a normal live using your (pc, laptop, tablet, android, iphone,internet, e-mail,...) or you can be a Solution Architect in Matrix using (openstack, kubernetes, openshift, ansible, dynamic provisioning, Horizontal Autoscalling, ceph, glusterfs, hadoop, ansible, virtualization, python, blade servers, Storage Cabinets, AWS, GPD, Azure, managed switches, Firewalls,..) for providing services to Matrix users...

Hello my name is Francisco José Rodríguez Rubio and want to brind you a little of that red pill in this blog.

Contact: franitel@gmx.com
